creditline: Gift of Shelly Errington from the collection of her brother, Trois E. Johnson, M.D., and given in his memory
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: golden brown patina; standing woman holding a book her in PL hand; PR hand in a fist with a hole in center; woman has thick hair beneath a headscarf; woman stands on an attached base which is unfinished on the back; masking tape with "13" on back
title: Figure of Mary Magdalene
